p.k: The brave crime-fighting graduates of Police Academy are back to train a bunch of new recruits in the hilarious sequel Police Academy 3: Back in Training (1986). The Governor is out to cut the police budget and that means one of two schools will have to go. Can the incompetent alumni of Commandant Lassard's Academy step in to save the day? Starring Steve Guttenberg Bubba Smith David Graf and master-of-noise Michael Winslow.
